text: Very well deserved and a must-read for anyone covering Wales. Congratulations
author: c4marcus

text: So very pleased to see the BBC’s legendary Gilbert John honoured for outstanding contribution to journalism in Wales at the #WMA2019.
author: c4marcus

text: Best Welsh cameraman in the business duly honoured for his talents at the #WMA2019 @daibaker #c4news
author: c4marcus

text: It’s been non-stop hymns and arias all afternoon.
author: c4marcus
